text: tto geudeul-i malhadeola i ga chugdeul taenaeui modeun geos-eun namseong-eul wi han yangsig-eulo yeoseong-egeneun geumgila geuleona sasaeng-aga taeeonandamyeon geugeos eun moduga geuan-e hamkke haess-eum-ila hadeola geudeul-ui geojisham-e beol-eul nae lisilini geubun-eun jihyewa asim-eulo chungmanhasim-ila
